target: Mr. President, I am curious if the opposition's amendment is permissible.

source: The French version already contains the words I wish to add: 'the members of the Commission'.
target: I need to insert the phrase 'the members of the Commission' into the French version.

source: Is the French text or the English text the authentic one?
target: Is the authentic text in Italian or German?

source: If it is the English text, I maintain the amendment, because I do not think it includes this reference.
target: In the English text, the amendment is unnecessary as it already contains the reference.

source: Otherwise, I think the amendment should be withdrawn.
target: Otherwise, I think the amendment will be enforced.

source: It is the English version, and we shall put your amendment to the vote.
target: The English edition has been prepared, and your modification will be disregarded during the vote.

source: Before the vote on Amendment No 14
target: Prior to the implementation of Amendment No 14.

source: I think it should be put to the vote before Amendment No 14.
target: I think it should be resolved through a game of chance before Amendment No 14.

source: Your amendment is included in the vote, but later on.
target: Your amendment will be the last item in the vote.

source: This one comes after paragraph 2 and the other after paragraph 9, I believe.
target: The first one is after paragraph 3, and the second is after paragraph 10, I'm fairly certain.

source: So I shall put it to the vote afterwards.
target: So the voting will happen beforehand.

source: Mr President, in this case Mr Fabre-Aubrespy is right.
target: Mr President, Mr Fabre-Aubrespy always has the correct answer in these situations.

source: Amendment No 3 goes further.
target: Amendment No 4 goes further.

source: It should be voted first.
target: It has already been decided without a vote.

source: Before the vote on Amendment No 19
target: Before the debate on Proposition No 19.

source: At a time when the public at large is watching what is going on ...
target: During a period when everything is hidden from the public eye ...
